thread.title: Jackie Bowers

author: Jackie Bowers
title: Jackie Bowers
text: We wanted to send a birthday gift from England to our godson in Australia - found this site. The choice was excellent, once the order placed the communication was really good and we knew when the gift had been delivered. Our godson sent us a great picture of his birthday gift of his beer hamper and he was very very pleased.... and so were we!
